Cult classic, with fantastic narrative entertaining characters and challenging puzzle mechanics.

Рекомендую, но нужно признать, что игра затянутая. В середине становится очень скучно. Слишком мало сюжета и слишком много беганья не понятно где и не понятно зачем. Начало и концовка фееричные и тем самым очень сильно контрастируют с проседающей серединой игры. Бесконечные загрузки напрягают. 
Первая часть понравилась больше.

jogo legal, quebra cabeças enteresantes, historia maneira, e faz vc quebrar a cbç para conseguir passar das fases
IRADO

JUEGAZO. Me encanta como expande las mecanicas del primer juego y pone a prueba tu destreza para resolver puzzles de una manera diferente y desafiante pero sin llegar a la frustracion.
Los personajes que con quienes interactuamos se llevan toda la gloria, super carismaticos a su manera, en especial wheatley. me encanto como llevaron las historia para quetenga coherencia con el primer juego y te tenga entretenido por el tiempo que demora la campaña.
Ademas de que la opcion de que la comunidad cree sus propias sala para retas a otros jugadores a resolverla lo hace un juego practicamente infinito. Ahora se de donde saco NINTENDO la inspiracion para SUPER MARIO MAKER. 
Conclusion: Totalmente RECOMENDADO, es mas si no has jugado PORTAL o PORTAL 2 deberian banearte de STEAM.
One of the best games I've ever played, without a doubt. The story, the atmosphere, the music. Everything about this game is just amazing.

Portal 2 is an excellent sequel to the Portal franchise!
If you are looking for a great puzzle game I would say this game is for you!
So anyways here are my thoughts and opinions of this game's qualities:
==================================================================

Story is very awesome! (10/10)
>> I don't want to spoil the story but I would add that the story is a great
sequel that doesn't disappoint!
>> I really felt like I wanted to know what would happen next all the time!
>> I could just say I couldn't ask for more than this!

Level design is a masterpiece! (10/10)
>> The levels present challenging and interesting puzzles.
>> It is definitely an improvement over the first game!
>> I haven't felt too stuck in the levels but it did take time to complete them.
>> Every test chamber felt so satisfying to complete!
>> There is a huge variety of level designs that all feel and work very well!
>> The environment is very carefully designed to work on a whole other level!
>> Over all very well done to the developers!

Graphics are Amazing! (10/10)
>> The graphics are so good even now a days it still holds very well!
>> This game's graphics are a huge improvement from the last game!
>> The graphics definitely compliment this game's atmosphere astonishingly!
>> I especially liked the broken glass and laser effects/particles!
>> Nothing really felt out of place.

Game setting/atmosphere is excellent (10/10)
>> Portal 2 improves on the already very cool and good atmosphere!
>> Portal 2 brings new locations that create the perfect atmosphere.
>> In this game you could really tell how big is the Aperture Science lab!
>> I never felt like the developers did a lazy job, they worked very hard on every
corner and it shows!

Puzzles are very well designed (10/10)
>> The puzzles as I already said are challenging and fun.
>> I am very impressed with how they handled them and made them so good!
>> The puzzles them selves aren't frustrating which is a very good thing!

The "tools" are very fun (10/10)
>> The 'Portal-Gun' itself is very fun and a cool idea, but in this game
they decided to add a few more things that would help make the portal
gun and the environment even more fun and enjoyable!

Combat is still very fun (10/10)
>> This is a portal game so there isn't too much to say about combat.
>> I really liked the ways that you fight the enemies, and the final boss
is designed perfectly.
>> I really enjoyed engaging in combat!

Sounds are amazing (9/10)
>> Sounds fit the game and its atmosphere in a beneficial way!
>> I believe that the sounds still hold up to this day very well!
>> The voice acting also feels perfect and immersive!

Movement is well done (9/10)
>> It really sucks that you can't crouch jump in this game,
or bunny-hop like in Portal 1, but I feel that made the game feel
more serious and less buggy!
>> And everything else is pretty much still there.
>> Nothing more to add here, I really like the movement of source games.

Achievement are  fun (8/10)
>> I haven't completed all of them, but the once that I did I enjoyed
very much!
>> You will complete around 40%-50% of them just by playing through the
campaign!

Soundtracks are good (7/10)
>> There aren't too many soundtracks which is a shame because,
the tracks that do exist are so good and well made!
>> The OSTs fit the game atmosphere so well and don't feel out of place!
>> I especially liked the little songs that play when you jump from a "jump 
pad?"(or however those things called) or fly through the level!

Other:
Cons:
- I would wish for more variety in the enemy types.
- I also wish that Valve would've made the puzzles' solutions a bit more
obvious, because for me at least I felt sometimes that I didn't know what
to do next, and it sucked, but luckily it wasn't for very long!

Side comments/notes:
- I played through the campaign about 2-3 times and still enjoy it!
- I also played a bit co-op and it was very fun! but I feel like I haven't
played the co-op enough so I won't be reviewing it.
==================================================================
So after all of that, finally, I would give Portal 2 a very solid (9/10),
想说点什么，但是又没啥好说的

Jedna z najlepszych w jaką grałem! Polecam zacząć od pierwszej części, która wprowadza cię w tą jedyną w swoim rodzaju fabułę. Poza fabułą masz również tryb kooperacyjny, który świetnie się sprawdza gdy masz z kim zagrać. Gra dba o to byś nieustannie myślał/a nad rozwiązaniem. Gra mimo daty wydania ma świetną grafikę oraz oprawę dźwiękową. Mam nadzieję że kiedyś nadejdzie następna część, która prezentuję nowy rodzaj fabuły.
游戏史上最有创意的游戏，没有之一

Po kilku dobrych godzinach rozgrywki gra zrobiła na mnie bardzo dobre wrażenie. W czasie pandemii dobra odskocznia od nudy, zagadki czasami bywają trudne (przynajmniej w moim przypadku) a gra ze znajomymi także sprawia dużo frajdy. Jeśli masz przy sobie zbędne 36 złotych to polecam tą grę bardzo ciepło
